about_the_game:
Enjoy the maximum show with the Season Pass, thanks to tons of content that will make your experience even more adrenaline-pumping!
17 new trucks coming from different eras and universes await you, together with a new environment, containing 6 new tracks and 1 new arena to show off your skills, and a boosting XP Multiplier to get the most out of your tricks.

This pack features:
  • Monster Jam™ Showdown - Experience Multiplier
  • Monster Jam™ Showdown - Soldiers & Pirates
  • Monster Jam™ Showdown - Grave Digger™ Legacy
  • Monster Jam™ Showdown - Aloha Expansion
  • Monster Jam™ Showdown - Off The Leash
  • Monster Jam™ Showdown - Always On Duty

All content included in Season Pass will be released by February 2025.
